tags.label: xtal-siema
tags.description: Light-weight wrapper around siemal carousel library

attributes.label: start-index
attributes.description: Index to start slide show from.

attributes.label: attr-for-selected
attributes.description: Specify attribute to set when child element is selected by siema.

attributes.label: easing
attributes.description: It is like a CSS transition-timing-function â€” describes acceleration curve.

attributes.label: per-page
attributes.description: The number of slides to be shown. It accepts a number  or an object for complex responsive layouts.

attributes.label: undraggable
attributes.description: Do not use dragging and touch swiping

attributes.label: single-drag
attributes.description: Disallow dragging to move multiple slides

attributes.label: threshold
attributes.description: Touch and mouse dragging threshold (in px)

attributes.label: new-selection
attributes.description: Jump to new index / page number
